alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dixie County through 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cross City to near Horseshoe Point to 34 miles southwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. aT 650pm EDT, the Horseshoe Beach Weatherstem measured a wind gust of 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
